This PHP plugin is primarily designed fo: This PHP plugin is primarily designed for Linux environments. While Windows support is available, certain file operations, such as backups, may experience reduced performance. This is due to known PHP limitations on Windows systems (e.g., PHP Bug #80695). For optimal results, we recommend using a Linux-based system.
